00012     ORCaenV260Decoder() {}

00014 
00015     virtual inline UInt_t CrateOf(UInt_t* record)
00016       { return (record[1] & 0x001E00000) >> 21; }
00017     virtual inline UInt_t CardOf(UInt_t* record)
00018       { return (record[1] & 0x00001F0000) >> 16; }
00019     virtual inline UInt_t UTimeOf(UInt_t* record)
00020       { return record[2]; }
00021     virtual inline size_t NScalersOf(UInt_t* /*record*/)
00022       { return 16; }
00023     virtual inline UInt_t IthChannelOf(size_t i) 
00024       { return i; }
00025     virtual inline UInt_t IthScalerOf(UInt_t* record, size_t i) 
00026       { return (record[3+i] & 0x00ffffff); }
00027 
00028     virtual inline std::string GetLabel() { return "CaenV260"; }
00029     virtual inline std::string GetDataObjectPath() 
00030       { return "ORCaen260Model:Caen260"; }

00032     // for basic trees
00033     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 5; }
00034     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00035     virtual size_t GetNRows(UInt_t* record) { return NScalersOf(record); }
